<< ACTOR 1 >>
<< CUTSCENE ACTOR LIST >>
<StartAction>[Your mind drifts back to the events following the destruction of your home, as you lay unconcious before the wreckage, oblivious to the danger around you...]</Start>
<StartAction>[Through the fog of darkness, you hear a sinister voice speak.]</Start> I take it your meeting did not go as planned, master?
Indeed it did not... and Magistrate Okaris <LastName> has paid the price for it. He was a fool not to heed my warning...
It matters not. I do not need Okaris' aid for this task... we shall simply have to take matters into our own hands. If Ghaarak must fall in fire and blood, so be it!
The assault on the city has begun, and all shall tremble at the terrible might of the Followers of the Crimson Path! Soon, my faithful, we shall stand victorious!
Now, I have other affairs I must attend to in the city. That which was stolen from us must be recovered at all costs... Rakha was a fool to think He could ever stand against me!
And what of the Magistrate's child? What shall we do with <him/her>?

<StartAction>[You feel the burning eyes of the Crimson Prophet turn upon you.]</Start> Rid me of this nuisance! Let the entire line of <LastName> perish... as a lesson to all who would stand against us!
As you wish, master. Your word is my command...
Now, be quick about it! You and your men must join the others in razing this city to the ground! Leave none alive! Let all who stand by the Sharakhan Empire be consumed by the flames of war!

<StartAction>[As the Crimson Prophet weaves a spell to carry him away, your eyes open weakly to the sight of one of his fanatical followers standing above you, a massive axe held high over your head...]</Start>
<StartAction>[The fanatical Crimson Follower sneers at you.]</Start> Child of Okaris <LastName>, I take your life for the glory of the Crimson Prophet!

<StartAction>[You steel yourself for the blow of the axe, but it never comes. Just as the Crimson Follower prepares to bring his weapon down upon your neck, a crossbow bolt suddenly bursts through his throat, killing him instantly...]</Start>
<StartAction>[Markius Albright, a man you know well from the Market District, comes rushing forward in full plate, his crossbow still in hand...]</Start>
By Rakha's will, you shall not lay another hand upon that <boy/girl>! <FirstName>, get back! Get to safety! You shall not meet your end at the hands of the Crimson Prophet!
<StartAction>[Dropping his crossbow to his side, the armored man unsheathes his massive greatsword, and turns to the Crimson Followers.]</Start> Come, foul serpents! Come to your deaths!
<StartAction>[One of the Crimson Followers hisses and spits.]</Start> You have made a foolish mistake... one which you will soon regret! Come, Followers of the Crimson Path! To arms!
